# Set up 
```{r}
#| label: packages and data
#| message: false

library(tidyverse) #general use package
library(lterdatasampler) # package of datasets
library(NatParksPalettes) #color palette

data(pie_crab) #crab size dataset
```

# exploratory data visualization
```{r}
#| label: latitude and size plot
#| message: false

#base layer
ggplot(data = pie_crab, #data set
       aes(x = latitude, # x axis
           y = size,
       color = site))+ # y axis
  #first layer: points to represent individual crabs
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual( #changing colors to be different from default
    values = natparks.pals("Arches", n = 13, type = "continuous")
  )+
  theme_minimal() #adding theme

```
